name: The Wizard's Companion
description: A venerable tome, containing wizarding knowledge from ancient times to the present day.

name: Locket
description: A vessel worn around the neck, designed to store pieces of people's hearts.

name: Proof of Wits
description: A crest encased in a spherical gem that proves its owner has overcome the sagely Test of Wits.

name: Proof of Friendship
description: A crest encased in a spherical gem that proves its owner has overcome the sagely Test of Friendship.

name: Proof of Strength
description: A crest encased in a spherical gem that proves its owner has overcome the sagely Test of Strength.

name: Peculiar Pot
description: A large, garishly decorated cooking pot. It is much too large for use in a normal kitchen.

name: Cauldron
description: A vessel used to blend items together in order to create new ones. It is also the home of the genie Al-Khemi.

name: Giant Cheese Wedge
description: A magically produced hunk of cheese that requires both hands to carry. The Cowlipha's favorite snack.

name: Portrait
description: A picture of the Great Sage who is said to reside in the city of Hamelin. He looks like a very handsome man.

name: Letter of Passage
description: A letter that grants its bearer permission to board the Sea Cow, Her Moojesty's very own ship.

name: Piece of Art
description: One of the elements of comedy that fairies possess in abundance. There are said to be eight in total...

name: Skeleton Key
description: A key obtained on the Tombstone Trail of the past. But can it still be used in the present day...?

name: RIP Pass
description: A pass that allows the bearer to access an extremely exclusive RIP area.

name: Bronze Ticket
description: A bronze ticket that allows the bearer to view certain movies in the RIP area's Mem-O-Vision theater.

name: Silver Ticket
description: A silver ticket that allows the bearer to view certain movies in the RIP area's Mem-O-Vision theater.

name: Golden Ticket
description: A gold ticket that allows the bearer to view certain movies in the RIP area's Mem-O-Vision theater.

name: Platinum Ticket
description: A platinum ticket that allows the bearer to view certain movies in the RIP area's Mem-O-Vision theater.

name: Dragon Horn
description: A horn whose distinctive call can be heard by Tengri, wherever he may be. Press [key_u] to summon him.

name: Map of the Stones
description: A map that shows the locations of the three magic stones required to restore Mornstar's power.

name: Serpent Key
description: A key that opens the door to the Vault of Tears. A sinister snake is coiled around its shaft.

name: Sun Stone
description: One of the Wizard King's three magic stones. The life force contained within can cause the very earth to swell.

name: Star Stone
description: One of the Wizard King's three magic stones. The light contained within is truly dazzling.

name: Moon Stone
description: One of the Wizard King's three magic stones. The darkness within is like that of the night sky.

name: Wings of Xanadu
description: A medal entrusted to you by a female soldier from Xanadu. It is the only proof that she exists.

name: Piece of Holy Wood
description: A piece of wood, taken from a holy tree near Al Mamoon. Even in darkness, it gleams like polished silver.

name: Piece of Carved Holy Wood
description: A piece of wood, carved by King Tom in the ancient tradition of Ding Dong Dell royalty.

name: The Clarion
description: An instrument made using the talents of three kingdoms, and renowned as a symbol of peace.

name: Alicia's Pendant
description: A pendant that was given to Allie by Lucien. It contains nothing but pure motherly love.

name: Flower of Youth
description: A faintly glowing flower that contains a memory. Its soft red light represents blessing and prayer.

name: Flower of Faith
description: A faintly glowing flower that contains a memory. Its soft blue light symbolizes a vow that was made.

name: Flower of Hope
description: A faintly glowing flower that contains a memory. Its soft golden light is a symbol of hope.

name: Name Tag
description: This tag proves that your bond with your familiars is so deep, they'll even let you change their names.

name: Philmobile Key
description: A key to a sporty yellow car. Press [key_d] to get behind the wheel of the Philmobile.

name: Cherub's Wing
description: An elegant wing that once belonged to an angel. It can be used to enhance the heart-winning harp.

name: Heart of the Muse
description: A gem that enables one to commune with all living things. It can be used to enhance the heart-winning harp.

name: Blossom of the Bard
description: A decorative flower, much-prized by fairy comedians. It can be used to enhance the heart-winning harp.

name: Hog's Cog
description: A part that fell from a tank belonging to the Hamelin army. It can be used to improve the performance of handguns.

name: Gyro-Grappler
description: A piece of cutting-edge Hamelin technology. It can be used to improve the performance of handguns.

name: Cad's Clasp
description: A prized piece of vintage Hamelin engineering. It can be used to improve the performance of handguns.

name: Riddle Rivet
description: A curious part about which nothing is known, save that it can apparently improve the performance of handguns.

name: Mirror of Truth
description: A magical mirror, said to contain a great truth. No reflection appears when one gazes into it...

name: Spirit of the Woods
description: A deep green orb that once belonged to the Guardian of the Woods. A roaring gale is sealed within.

name: Spirit of the Glade
description: A blood-red orb that once belonged to a mighty warrior. Unquenchable fighting spirit is sealed within.

name: Spirit of the Temple
description: A crimson orb that once belonged to a beast with two blades. Countless sword strikes ring out from within.

name: Spirit of the Flame
description: A blazing orb that once belonged to an enormous, fiery giant. Roaring flames are sealed within.

name: Spirit of the Storm
description: A shining orb that once belonged to a creature which crackled with energy. A mighty storm is sealed within.

name: Spirit of the Snow
description: An icy orb that once belonged to a huge wolf. A raging blizzard is contained within.

name: Red Earring
description: A shiny red earring, given to a young grimalkin by her grandmother.

name: Lovers' Lunch Basket
description: A generously sized picnic, made with love by a wife for her husband. It looks nice and nutritious, too.

name: Turmeric Root
description: A rare root harvested from the lumberwood. Dried and ground, it makes for a very popular spice.

name: Pinch of Spicy Seeds
description: Bright red seeds that are usually found in volcanic regions. They are a very popular spice.

name: Bowl of Sheikh's Special Spices
description: A blend of rare spices, made in Al Mamoon according to a top-secret recipe.

name: Rainbow Leaf
description: An extremely beautiful leaf, dropped by the floret. Keep it in a cool place, or it will wilt.

name: Slapstick
description: The preferred prop of every fairy comedian. This model has a fine tone and an easy-grip, non-slip handle.

name: Feel-good Fungus
description: Despite looking rather unappetizing, this rare fungus has the power to cure every known ailment.

name: Broken Booster
description: A broken aircraft part that seems to be well beyond repair.

name: Brand-new Booster
description: An aircraft part that's been restored to top condition, and polished to a fine metallic gleam.

name: Snazzy Swimsuit
description: The latest in Castaway Cove swimwear fashion. Just the thing to make heads turn this summer!

name: Hometown Flower
description: A young girl in Perdida seems to want this regular tulip more than anything else in the world.

name: Cold Compress
description: This medical compress has a surface as soft as powder snow and soothes soreness in a matter of moments.

name: Set of Cat's Whiskers
description: A badge of honor, given to Ding Dong Dell's most accomplished guards. Also a popular fancy dress item.

name: Traveler's Diary
description: A diary recounting someone's journey through the Rolling Hills.

name: Traveler's Diary
description: A diary recounting someone's journey around the foothills of Old Smoky.

name: Traveler's Diary
description: A diary recounting someone's journey to Teeheeti.

name: Traveler's Diary
description: A diary recounting someone's journey across the Pig Iron Plain.

name: Traveler's Diary
description: A diary recounting someone's journey through the Winter Wonderlands.

name: Traveler's Diary
description: A diary recounting someone's journey to Nazcaä.

name: Traveler's Diary
description: A diary recounting the tale of how someone discovered ancient ruins to the south of Ding Dong Dell.

name: Lumberwood Ticket
description: A familiar ticket that can be exchanged for a lumberwood.

name: Relixx Ticket
description: A familiar ticket that can be exchanged for a relixx.

name: Dinoceros Ticket
description: A familiar ticket that can be exchanged for a dinoceros.

name: Idler Ticket
description: A familiar ticket that can be exchanged for an idler.

name: Tin-Man Ticket
description: A familiar ticket that can be exchanged for a golden tin-man.

name: Mandragorer Ticket
description: A familiar ticket that can be exchanged for a mandragorer.

name: Draggle Ticket
description: A familiar ticket that can be exchanged for a draggle.

name: Mite Ticket
description: A familiar ticket that can be exchanged for a golden mite.

name: Drongo Ticket
description: A familiar ticket that can be exchanged for a golden drongo.

name: Hurly Ticket
description: A familiar ticket that can be exchanged for a golden hurly.

name: Sapdragon Ticket
description: A familiar ticket that can be exchanged for a sapdragon.

name: Flutterby Ticket
description: A familiar ticket that can be exchanged for a flutterby.

name: Griffy Ticket
description: A familiar ticket that can be exchanged for a griffy.

name: Loaf of White Bread
description: Soft white bread that never seems to go stale. Its fluffy texture makes it filling but not heavy.

name: Sandwich
description: A luxurious sandwich, filled with thick, juicy cuts of prime beef.

name: Fishburger
description: A circular sandwich containing a deep-fried fillet of fish. The lack of bones makes for easy eating.

name: Cheeseburger
description: A juicy all-beef patty, plenty of fresh salad, and some melted cheese, served in a toasted bun.

name: Tonic
description: An invigorating fluid, made using medicinal herbs. It soaks into deep wounds, easing their pain.

name: Bowl of Tikka Mahala
description: A marriage of tender beef, chunky vegetables, and exquisite spices that will leave you wanting more.

name: Bottle of Pixie Dew
description: A restorative dew collected from the leaves of a forest glade where pixies were once said to play.

name: Bottle of Sprite Dew
description: Though not technically dew, this spritely byproduct is blessed with miraculous healing properties.

name: Bottle of Iced Coffee
description: A sweet, milky drink with a gentle coffee flavor. So mild that even children can enjoy it.

name: Cup of Strong Coffee
description: A coffee with a deep, bitter flavor. Its strength makes it something of an acquired taste.

name: Cappuccino
description: A rich cappuccino that combines coffee and frothy milk to provide a uniquely refreshing experience.

name: Espresso
description: A dark coffee that's almost too bitter to drink. A single sip is enough to get your brain in gear.

name: Bottle of Nostrum
description: A magical elixir with a slightly sweet aroma that invigorates the weary heart. Restores magical power.

name: Vial of Sage's Secret
description: Several eminent sages worked on the development of this potion, which restores mind and body alike.

name: Vial of Great Sage's Secret
description: An extremely effective potion, created by fairies who were commissioned by a famous wizard.

name: Vial of Wizard King's Secret
description: Said to be an invention of the greatest wizard in history, this potion's restorative power is unequalled.
effect: Fully restores HP and MP to all allies.

name: Phoenix Feather
description: A magical feather that can restore consciousness to one who has fallen during battle.

name: Phoenix Tear
description: A beautiful, crystal-clear teardrop, shed to commiserate those who have died in battle.
effect: Restores consciousness and fully restores HP.

name: Pouch of Phoenix Breath
description: The breath of a sacred beast, known to revive even the most reckless of fallen warriors.
effect: Restores consciousness and full HP to all allies.

name: Poison-Be-Gone
description: Leaves that extract poison from the body. Their bitter aftertaste is said to be proof of their effectiveness.

name: Nix-Be-Gone
description: A curious paintbrush, the bristles of which are imbued with the power to cure nixed magic users.

name: Confusion-Be-Gone
description: A quick tap on the head with this hammer will restore clarity to the most muddled of minds.

name: Sleep-Be-Gone
description: This alarm clock will cause one to wake from the deepest slumber feeling refreshed and alert.

name: Stone-Be-Gone
description: A magical powder that frees an ally from petrification's stony prison.

name: Curse-Be-Gone
description: Cool, refreshing water that has been blessed with the power to lift curses.

name: Blindness-Be-Gone
description: The core of this strange fruit glows brightly, and has long been used to aid those overcome by darkness.

name: All-Be-Gone
description: This miraculous substance will cure a conscious ally of all ailments. Very valuable and difficult to obtain.

name: Bar of Chocolate
description: Chocolate with a high sugar content, making it popular with those who have a sweet tooth.

name: Bar of Milk Chocolate
description: Good-quality chocolate with a creamy, melt-in-the-mouth texture that's simply divine.

name: Bar of Fairy Chocolate
description: Bubbly texture and surpassing sweetness are the keys to this treat's popularity. A great pick-me-up.

name: Handful of Chocolate Bonbons
description: Chocolate that comes in cute little bite-sized pieces, making it a perfect snack for sharing.

name: Handful of Snowdrop Bonbons
description: Delicately flavored chunks of bright blue chocolate which seem to cool the mouth as they melt.

name: Princess Chocolate
description: Luxurious chocolates, packed with fresh berries. Their fabulous flavor will make anyone feel like royalty!

name: Flan
description: A silky set custard, served in a rich caramel sauce that adds a delightful touch of bitterness.

name: Creamy Flan
description: A light set custard that wobbles pleasingly. Its smoothness is the stuff of legend.

name: Babana Flan
description: The smell of fresh babanas makes this flan an appetizing treat. Also known as the "dessert of the desert."

name: Frosty Flan
description: A flan with a satisfyingly crunchy texture. Despite its name and color, however, it is not actually frozen.

name: Fruit Flan
description: A flan that's packed with juicy grapes for an intensely fruity flavor.

name: Fantastic Flan
description: This wonderful flan shines like a star and brings good luck to whoever eats it.

name: Cake
description: This simple strawberry sponge is a baker's staple, popular with people of all ages in every part of the world.

name: Carrot Cake
description: Packed with sweet, juicy carrots, this cake is a good way to get children to eat more vegetables.

name: Carnation Cake
description: An immaculately presented cake, with a flowery aroma that's sure to have a calming effect.

name: Breeze Cake
description: This cake has a powerful breeze trapped inside, providing a unique sensation for those who bite into it.

name: Patty Cake
description: A cake said to contain equal measures of vim and vigor. Brings a smile to anyone who tries it.

name: Hot Cake
description: The power of a fiery dragon is said to be contained within this magical cake. Its taste is simply out of this world.

name: Sundae
description: A chilled dessert that has a fine, refreshing sweetness. Almost anything can be added as a topping.

name: Sour Sundae
description: A sundae made using generous helpings of yogurt, giving it a really mouthwatering tang.

name: Wildflower Sundae
description: A sundae flavored with wild flowers. While its taste is rather subtle, it is also curiously comforting.

name: Toadstool Sundae
description: This sundae's curious appearance puts many people off eating it—a real waste, as its taste is truly sensational!

name: Sarsaparilla Sundae
description: Though packed with nutrients, this sundae's intensely sour flavor makes for a poor "treat."

name: Knickerbocker Glory
description: This "king of sundaes" enjoys the sort of enduring popularity that has proved elusive for many world leaders.

name: Slice of Pie
description: A piping hot pie with a crumbly crust. The sight of one is enough to whet anyone's appetite.

name: Slice of Sweetie Pie
description: A pie with a sweet filling and a soft, yet firm crust. Best eaten while still hot from the oven.

name: Slice of See-Through Pie
description: The gelatinous filling of this pie is so clear that one would be forgiven for missing it altogether.

name: Slice of Game Pie
description: A pie filled with fine cuts of various meats. The sound of stampeding hooves can be heard within.

name: Pie on the Bone
description: A pie containing an entire joint of meat, served on the bone. And what better way to hold said snack?

name: Slice of Golden Pie
description: This golden-brown pie has a rich, deep glow and a taste that makes it the darling of the baking industry.

name: Ice Cream
description: This ice cream is just the thing when you need to cool down. Just be careful that you don't eat too much.

name: Salted Ice Cream
description: Though it may be an acquired taste, this ice cream's uniquely bittersweet flavor makes it perennially popular.

name: Ruby Ripple Ice Cream
description: Though it gleams like a ruby, this ice cream does not contain any precious stones.

name: Soft Scoop Ice Cream
description: An ice cream with a rare fluffiness that puts one in mind of a cloud.

name: Snow-White Ice Cream
description: A dazzlingly bright white ice cream that's popular with adults and children alike.

name: Tutti-Frutti Ice Cream
description: An ice cream that glitters with all the colors of the rainbow. So pretty, it seems a shame to eat it.

name: Sundrop
description: A curious candy that's said to contain the power of the sun. Induces metamorphosis in familiars.
effect: Allows a sun-sign familiar to metamorphose into a second form.

name: Stardrop
description: A curious candy that's said to contain the power of the stars. Induces metamorphosis in familiars.
effect: Allows a star-sign familiar to metamorphose into a second form.

name: Moondrop
description: A curious candy that's said to contain the power of the moon. Induces metamorphosis in familiars.
effect: Allows a moon-sign familiar to metamorphose into a second form.

name: Planetdrop
description: A curious candy that's said to contain the power of a planet. Induces metamorphosis in familiars.
effect: Allows a planet-sign familiar to metamorphose into a second form.

name: Jumbo Sundrop
description: A rare candy that's said to contain the power of the sun. Induces a dramatic metamorphosis in familiars.
effect: Allows a sun-sign familiar to metamorphose into a final form.

name: Jumbo Stardrop
description: A rare candy that's said to contain the power of the stars. Induces a dramatic metamorphosis in familiars.
effect: Allows a star-sign familiar to metamorphose into a final form.

name: Jumbo Moondrop
description: A rare candy that's said to contain the power of the moon. Induces a dramatic metamorphosis in familiars.
effect: Allows a moon-sign familiar to metamorphose into a final form.

name: Jumbo Planetdrop
description: A rare candy that's said to contain the power of a planet. Induces a dramatic metamorphosis in familiars.
effect: Allows a planet-sign familiar to metamorphose into a final form.

name: Fling Flame Gem
description: A crimson gemstone that contains the crystallized power of a blazing flame.
effect: Allows a familiar to learn the Fling Flame trick.

name: Firewall Gem
description: A crimson gemstone that contains the crystallized power of a blazing flame.
effect: Allows a familiar to learn the Firewall trick.

name: Spire of Fire Gem
description: A crimson gemstone that contains the crystallized power of a blazing flame.
effect: Allows a familiar to learn the Spire of Fire trick.

name: Heat Ray Gem
description: A crimson gemstone that contains the crystallized power of a blazing flame.
effect: Allows a familiar to learn the Heat Ray trick.

name: Water Bomb Gem
description: A deep blue gemstone that contains the crystallized power of a crashing wave.
effect: Allows a familiar to learn the Water Bomb trick.

name: Bubble Bath Gem
description: A deep blue gemstone that contains the crystallized power of a crashing wave.
effect: Allows a familiar to learn the Bubble Bath trick.

name: Snowball Gem
description: A deep blue gemstone that contains the crystallized power of a crashing wave.
effect: Allows a familiar to learn the Snowball trick.

name: Snowblower Gem
description: A deep blue gemstone that contains the crystallized power of a crashing wave.
effect: Allows a familiar to learn the Snowblower trick.

name: Thunderspark Gem
description: A pure green gemstone that contains the crystallized power of a roaring thunderstorm.
effect: Allows a familiar to learn the Thunderspark trick.

name: Thunderstorm Gem
description: A pure green gemstone that contains the crystallized power of a roaring thunderstorm.
effect: Allows a familiar to learn the Thunderstorm trick.

name: Whirligig Gem
description: A pure green gemstone that contains the crystallized power of a roaring thunderstorm.
effect: Allows a familiar to learn the Whirligig trick.

name: Whirly Whirlies Gem
description: A pure green gemstone that contains the crystallized power of a roaring thunderstorm.
effect: Allows a familiar to learn the Whirly Whirlies trick.

name: Healing Tear Gem
description: A gleaming gemstone that contains the crystallized power of a divine light.
effect: Allows a familiar to learn the Healing Tear trick.

name: Healing Rain Gem
description: A gleaming gemstone that contains the crystallized power of a divine light.
effect: Allows a familiar to learn the Healing Rain trick.

name: Purifying Pulse Gem
description: A gleaming gemstone that contains the crystallized power of a divine light.
effect: Allows a familiar to learn the Purifying Pulse trick.

name: Light Relief Gem
description: A gleaming gemstone that contains the crystallized power of a divine light.
effect: Allows a familiar to learn the Light Relief trick.

name: Darkness Beckons Gem
description: A sinister gemstone that contains the crystallized power of an impenetrable darkness.
effect: Allows a familiar to learn the Darkness Beckons trick.

name: Dark Cloud Gem
description: A sinister gemstone that contains the crystallized power of an impenetrable darkness.
effect: Allows a familiar to learn the Dark Cloud trick.

name: Drowsy Drops Gem
description: A sinister gemstone that contains the crystallized power of an impenetrable darkness.
effect: Allows a familiar to learn the Drowsy Drops trick.

name: Leech Gem
description: A sinister gemstone that contains the crystallized power of an impenetrable darkness.
effect: Allows a familiar to learn the Leech trick.

name: Roly-Poly Gem
description: An unusually weighty gemstone that contains a mighty destructive force in crystallized form.
effect: Allows a familiar to learn the Roly-Poly trick.

name: Pebble Pelt Gem
description: An unusually weighty gemstone that contains a mighty destructive force in crystallized form.
effect: Allows a familiar to learn the Pebble Pelt trick.

name: Earsplitter Gem
description: An unusually weighty gemstone that contains a mighty destructive force in crystallized form.
effect: Allows a familiar to learn the Earsplitter trick.

name: Poison Pinch Gem
description: An unusually weighty gemstone that contains a mighty destructive force in crystallized form.
effect: Allows a familiar to learn the Poison Pinch trick.

name: Blunt Gem
description: A colorless gemstone that contains the crystallized form of an elusive power.
effect: Allows a familiar to learn the Blunt trick.

name: Slow Poke Gem
description: A colorless gemstone that contains the crystallized form of an elusive power.
effect: Allows a familiar to learn the Slow Poke trick.

name: Soulshield Gem
description: A colorless gemstone that contains the crystallized form of an elusive power.
effect: Allows a familiar to learn the Soulshield trick.

name: Hocus Focus Gem
description: A colorless gemstone that contains the crystallized form of an elusive power.
effect: Allows a familiar to learn the Hocus Focus trick.

name: Rise and Shine Gem
description: A colorless gemstone that contains the crystallized form of an elusive power.
effect: Allows a familiar to learn the Rise and Shine trick.

name: Tricksy Nixy Gem
description: A colorless gemstone that contains the crystallized form of an elusive power.
effect: Allows a familiar to learn the Tricksy Nixy trick.

name: Plainswort Flower
description: This plant's beautiful orange flowers brighten up the open plains on which they grow.

name: Piece of Supple Leather
description: This leather's toughness and smooth surface make it a favored material among craftsmen the world over.

name: Bottle of Springwater
description: Clean water from a source hidden deep underground. Packed with minerals, and remarkably tasty.

name: Bunch of Booster Shoots
description: Herbs that are mainly used to increase potions' efficacy, especially in alchemical medicine making.

name: Baneflower
description: A flower that contains a highly lethal toxin. Keep apart from poison-be-gones, as they are easily confused.

name: Glowcap
description: A mystifying mushroom that emits a faint crimson glow. Though edible, its flavor leaves a lot to be desired.

name: Piece of Shadowglass
description: So black it seems to radiate darkness, this extremely hard glass can be used to make deadly sharp blades.

name: Emberstone
description: A red jewel that appears to contain an eternal flame, though some say it's just an optical illusion.

name: Bundle of Slumbernot Leaves
description: Herbs with an invigorating aroma that rouses one from sleep. Slumbernot bushes are easy to grow at home.

name: Rings-a-Bell
description: The pollen of this flower emits a faint glow during the hours of darkness, conjuring warm recollections.

name: Wetstone
description: This stone's permanent wetness means that it must be stored separately from other materials.

name: Sturdy Shinbone
description: A very robust bone. The identity of the animal from which it was taken remains a mystery.

name: Gnomebeard
description: A delicate plant notable for its soft, downy leaves and fluffy white flowers.

name: Angula
description: This flower's shape gives the impression that it is stiff and rigid, but it is in fact soft and delicate.

name: Sprocket
description: A poor-quality, rusted iron cog which presumably once formed a part of some sort of machine.

name: Lump of Raw Steel
description: Very strong steel, said to be impervious to rust. Often used in alchemy to create weapons and armor.

name: Rumblenut
description: A hard nut with a curious pattern on its shell. Shaking it produces a surprisingly loud rumbling sound.

name: Drill Screw
description: An innovative screw that does not require a hole to be bored before use. They are not yet widely available.

name: Bass Bell
description: Despite its size, this bell produces a very deep pitch when struck, reverberating deep within one's heart.

name: Fogdrop
description: A flower whose pollen is emitted in clouds of cold mist. Receiving one as a gift is said to be very bad luck.

name: Jade Marble
description: A large, opaque marble, made of pure jade. Often used as a decorative material.

name: Gustplume
description: An elegant feather with a smooth, streamlined shape. Generally used as a form of decoration.

name: Blizzard Bloom
description: An icy flower that's always cold to the touch. It can only be grown in very cold climates.

name: Piece of Tealwood
description: A fragrant wood that's a common ingredient in high-class perfumes.

name: Snowflake
description: A perfectly formed, pure-white snowflake that will not melt when held in the hand.

name: Coldstone
description: A slab of silver-colored ore, often used to keep things cool when ice is unavailable.

name: Drakestone
description: A fossil of a dragon, bright red in color and still retaining a searing heat that makes it difficult to carry around.

name: Iron Diamond
description: A piece of metal that forms a perfect diamond shape. Its dull glow is uniquely captivating.

name: Bunch of Sour Grapes
description: A rare variety of grape, prized for its pale purple color and refreshingly bittersweet taste.

name: Powerstone
description: A stone marked with an ancient magical seal. It is used in alchemy to make weapons even more destructive.

name: Bubble Pipe
description: Blowing bubbles through this pipe helps focus one's mind and allows for deep contemplation.

name: Tachestone
description: A stone shaped like a moustache. Each one stores the memories and experiences of a living being.

name: Handful of Crownberries
description: Beautiful, brightly colored berries that are ripe and ready to eat. Plump, flavorsome, and fit for a king.

name: Big Babana
description: This "king of babanas" has been overripened until red, and is extremely satisfying to peel open and eat.

name: Meteorite Fragment
description: A glowing stone that fell suddenly from the sky. It comprises minerals that cannot be found elsewhere.

name: Blowpipe
description: Believed to have been invented by an ancient wizard, these pipes are used to blow one's worries away.

name: Star Pearl
description: A pink pearl whose five points make it look like a star. It is curiously warm to the touch.

name: Pair of Black Wings
description: The wings of a bird that resides in total darkness. They take on a life of their own when exposed to a breeze.

name: Bunch of Old Oak Leaves
description: Large, soft leaves shed by Old Father Oak himself. Their numerous nutrients make them a popular medicinal ingredient.

name: Ritestone
description: A tablet carved from a magical stone, once used in ancient rituals.

name: Handful of Seeds of Discord
description: Countless wars have been fought over these seeds and their golden flowers.

name: All-Seeing Eye
description: A flawless, perfectly transparent gemstone, carved into the shape of an iris.

name: Kaleidostone
description: The elegant fossil of an ancient sea creature. It produces a dazzling array of colors when exposed to light.

name: Clump of Troll's Tears
description: These tiny stones are generally found clinging to large boulders. Their name derives from their deep blue color.

name: Glowstone
description: A stone that emits a pale glow, reminiscent of the moon. Popularly carried as a good luck charm.

name: Pair of Angel's Wings
description: These angelic wings emit a pure light that is believed to be inextinguishable.

name: Evil Eye
description: A spherical red jewel said to contain the soul of a demon. It is both fascinating and unsettling to look upon.

name: Scroll of Truth
description: All the world's knowledge is said to be inscribed on these scrolls. Sadly, they are sealed and cannot be opened.

name: Jar of Bumbler Honey
description: Natural honey produced by the bumbler. Much-loved for its fragrance and intensely sweet taste.

name: Dumpty Egg
description: A fresh, spherical egg that's jam-packed with nutrients. An important part of any hearty breakfast.

name: Head of Crispy Lettuce
description: A crispy salad vegetable, its texture helps add bite to a whole range of dishes.

name: Crunchy Carrot
description: A sweet, succulent carrot. Delicious when eaten raw, these can also be used to make treats for familiars.

name: Bowl of Yogurt
description: Fresh yogurt, made from high-quality milk. It has a creamy texture and a taste that's not too sour.

name: Hunk of Tender Beef
description: A popular cut of meat that simply melts in the mouth. This versatile ingredient will never let you down.

name: Bunch of Babanas
description: Al Mamoon's famous local delicacy. Babanas have a rich, sweet taste that makes them perennially popular.

name: Bottle of Creamy Milk
description: Thick milk with a wonderful farm-fresh flavor. It is used as an ingredient in a wide variety of dishes.

name: Plate of Fluffy Rice
description: A gleaming bowl of cooked white rice. The perfect accompaniment for dishes with intense flavors.

name: Dumbflounder
description: A fish well-known for its surprised expression. Its savory smell and lack of bones seem to invite cooking.

name: Glowshrimp
description: A shellfish whose faint glow makes it easy to catch. Though naturally blue, they turn red when cooked.

name: Bunch of Green Grapes
description: The bunches of this succulent fruit look like clusters of glistening gems. Of course, gems don't smell as nice.

name: Black Truffle
description: These "black diamonds" are the snack of choice for aristocrats everywhere.

name: Handful of Caramels
description: Smooth caramel that makes for a perfect sweet treat. Its mild flavor suits every palate.

name: Snow Radish
description: An enormous variety of radish, known for its dazzling white color and satisfying, crunchy texture.

name: Sun Crystal
description: A crystal said to contain the power of the sun. It is noticeably warm to the touch.

name: Star Crystal
description: A crystal said to contain the power of the stars. It shines intermittently during the night.

name: Moon Crystal
description: A crystal said to contain the power of the moon. It gives off a pale light that turns its surroundings silver.

name: Planet Crystal
description: A crystal said to contain the power of a planet. Its gleaming ring makes it easily distinguishable.

name: Old Stick
description:
A twig found near Oliver's house. Faint symbols adorn its surface:
[nz_e][nz_p][nz_o][nz_h][nz_g][nz_n][nz_i][nz_r][nz_b].

name: Old Stick
description:
A twig found near Oliver's house. Faint symbols adorn its surface:
[nz_e][nz_p][nz_o][nz_h][nz_g][nz_n][nz_i][nz_r][nz_b].

name: Magic Wand
description: Though comparatively easy to use, a wand like this will only come to life in the hands of a true wizard.

name: Mornstar
description: Very few wizards have the aptitude and attitude required to wield this legendary wand.

name: Mornstar
description: The legendary wand has been restored to its full might, granting its owner incredible magical power.

name: Imperial Scepter
description: A powerful wand that has belonged to the royal family of Hamelin for countless generations.

name: Astra
description: A wand that contains a wizard's soul, entrusted to Oliver so that he might save Cassiopeia from her fate.

name: Sky Tree Wand
description: A holy wand, carved from the branch of an ancient tree whose flowers bloom in three different colors.

name: Timeworn Harp
description: Esther's harp. Though it has seen a lot of use, it is still capable of producing a truly beautiful sound.

name: Heart-Winning Harp
description: A harp fashioned by a playful spirit. Hearing its song is enough to soothe the hearts of wild beasts.

name: Herald's Harp
description: A harp that's as light as a single feather from an angel's wing. Its voice floats up to the very heavens.

name: Muse's Harp
description: A legendary harp, said to have been used by a goddess who could communicate with all living creatures.

name: Bard's Harp
description: A harp passed down through generations of comedians. Its sound is sure to bring a smile to your face.

name: Pickpocket's Pistol
description: The wire fired by this gun can be used to pick the locks of distant treasure chests.

name: Rogue's Revolver
description: A gun that shoots several wires at once, making it possible to pick even more complicated locks.

name: Highwayman's Handgun
description: A gun made using the latest Hamelin technology. It takes experience to get the most from its complex design.

name: Cad's Cannon
description: Believed to have once been used by a legendary thief, the lock that this gun cannot pick has yet to be designed.

name: Masterthief's Magnum
description: A gun that's shrouded in mystery. Indeed, there is some debate as to whether it exists at all.

name: Oliver's Clothes
description: Oliver's favorite outfit, combining a yellow sweater and a comfortable pair of blue pants.

name: Set of Traveler's Clothes
description: A special set of clothes made from the woven fibers of the Sky Tree. Said to bring travelers good fortune.

name: Bathing Suit
description: A swimsuit provided by the Governor of Castaway Cove. It doesn't fare at all badly in the fashion stakes.

name: Suit of Hamelin Armor
description: The standard uniform of the Hamelin grunt, known for its generous waistband and pig-shaped helmet.

name: Set of Winter Clothes
description: Indispensable when in the Winter Isles, these garments keep one warm in even the most unrelenting snowstorm.

name: Esther's Clothes
description: A popular outfit among the young women of Al Mamoon, allowing for freedom of movement when dancing.

name: Bathing Suit
description: A swimsuit whose color puts one in mind of the ocean. Its light skirt flutters gently in the sea breeze.

name: Suit of Hamelin Armor
description: Made especially for female soldiers, this armor retains a certain elegance despite its ghastly expression.

name: Set of Winter Clothes
description: A winter coat decorated with pom-poms that are believed to be tokens of affection in the tomte community.

name: Shabby Coat
description:
A well-worn garment that's full of
holes. Or a "distressed" piece of
"vintage fashion," if you prefer.

name: Bathing Suit
description: An outfit that's perfect for sunbathing—provided the wearer doesn't desire anything approaching a tan.

name: Suit of Hamelin Armor
description: A large suit of armor capable of making even the scrawniest fellow look like a fearsome warrior.

name: Set of Winter Clothes
description: The traditional costume of Yule, embroidered with a pattern that's designed to ward off evil magic.

name: Fairy Suit
description: A basic fairy costume, woven using magic fibers that are guaranteed to provide a comfortable fit at all times.

name: Bathing Suit
description: Trunks made from special waterproof fibers that allow even the most incompetent swimmer to stay afloat.

name: Suit of Hamelin Armor
description: A Hamelin grunt's helmet, used to cover the entire body. Makes one look very silly when walking.

name: Furry Suit
description: A snugly fitting fairy costume with fluffy white trim. Makes any fairy look right at home in the snow!

name: Set of Regal Attire
description: A royal robe, lovingly woven from only the finest threads by the most accomplished tailor in all of Hamelin.

name: Bathing Raiment
description: High-quality Hamelin-made swimwear that provides comfort, elegance, and exemplary ventilation.

name: Set of Winter Vestments
description: The kind of warm garments worn in the Winter Isles. Despite their plain design, they are clearly well made.

name: Wooden Sword
description: A rather blunt sword, made of wood. More likely to give your enemies bruises than cuts.

name: Well-Worn Sword
description: A basic sword, commonly sold in Ding Dong Dell. A sharp and easy-to-use weapon at a reasonable price.

name: Bone Sword
description: A sword made from a large piece of bone. Not as sharp as metal weapons, perhaps, but considerably lighter.

name: Burning Blade
description: A sword that leaves trails of flame in the air when swung. Care must be taken not to burn oneself during use.

name: Roc Feather
description: A large sword, made from several feather-like blades. A single slash brings a terrifying storm in its wake.

name: Soldier's Sword
description: The basic weapon of the Hamelin grunt, with a blade that boasts rather impressive sharpness.

name: Clockwork Cleaver
description: The blade of this ingenious weapon contains a spinning cog that shreds anything it touches.

name: Black Blade
description: A jet-black sword that absorbs light and simultaneously darkens the wielder's mood.

name: Pirate's Cutlass
description: An intimidating weapon, beloved by pirates. The curved blade causes its victims untold agony.

name: Hero's Sword
description: A sword imbued with the power of a soldier once lauded as his kingdom's savior.

name: Bluster Blade
description: A magical sword, engraved with runes that allow it to turn the mildest breeze into a fierce whirlwind.

name: Champion's Sword
description: A replica of a sword from ancient legends. Wielding it requires one to have faith in its power.

name: Blazing Blade
description: Hellish flames dance upon the blade of this magical sword, allowing it to sear that which it slashes.

name: Greatsword
description: A sword that was once used by a warrior who lived only to fight. It is almost unreasonably large and heavy.

name: Lost Sword
description: A weapon that decided the outcome of an ancient war. Its power is still discernible through its coating of rust.

name: Radiant Blade
description: This sword shines brightly in the hands of the pure-hearted, allowing them to unleash their full potential.
effect: Restores HP when it damages an enemy.

name: Sainted Sword
description: A holy blade that always swings true, never missing its target. It is very effective at striking enemy weak spots.

name: Night Blade
description: A sword imbued with dark magic. Even as it drains its victim's ambition, it envelops the wielder in inky gloom.
effect: Damages the wielder as well as the enemy.

name: Skyfall Sword
description: Carved from a piece of rock that fell from the heavens, this sword contains metals not found in this world.

name: Celestial Sword
description: A sword that draws its considerable power from the stars themselves, thus becoming even sharper at night.

name: Nazcaän Longsword
description: Only chosen Nazcaän soldiers were allowed to use this blade. It is said to fill its wielder's heart with courage.

name: Primordial Sword
description: A sword that was thought only to exist in legends. It is said to have been used in the creation of all things.

name: Soppy Slapstick
description: This legendary fairy comedian's slapstick would be worth an absolute fortune...if it wasn't a replica.

name: Kitchen Knife
description: A small blade that does a good job of culinary chopping. Reasonably priced and useful during battle.

name: Flint Dagger
description: An old-fashioned knife, carved from a piece of rock. Its blunt blade makes it a rather ineffective weapon.

name: Sickle
description: A dagger with a viciously curved blade that can cut deeply into enemy flesh.

name: Candle Cutter
description: This blade has a flame-shaped tip that is constantly ablaze with magical fire.

name: Shadowglass Knife
description: An uneven blade, carved from a piece of jet-black stone, and designed to inflict agonizing wounds.

name: Sacred Dagger
description: A decorative dagger, mostly used for ceremonial purposes. Its holy nature means it is to be treated with care.

name: Witch's Thorn
description: One blow from this dagger's needle-like tip is often enough to render an enemy unconscious.

name: Divine Dagger
description: A dagger that confers divine protection upon its wielder. A definite advantage in battle.

name: Kiss of Death
description: A knife that is drawn to a victim's weak spots. A single blow can leave an enemy unconscious.

name: Woodsman's Knife
description: A dagger that makes ingenious use of an animal fang to enhance the attacking power of its wielder.

name: Ice Shard
description: A blade carved from ice that will never melt. Its cooling effect is known to be an aid to clear thinking.

name: Flitwing
description: A blade that moves faster than the speed of sound, allowing it to strike a victim before they can hear it coming.

name: Sorcerer's Soul
description: A dazzling dagger, made from pure crystallized light and said to have been crafted by a venerable wizard.

name: Planet Splitter
description: The infinite power of the universe resides within this blade, which slices through the air at the speed of light.

name: Spiral Horn
description: This animal horn has a distinctive spiral shape that makes it a somewhat tricky weapon to use effectively.

name: Whalefish Tusk
description: The horn of an ancient sea creature that could command the waves, costing many a sailor his life.

name: Poisoner's Horn
description: A horn that contains an extremely potent poison. Be sure to wear gloves when wielding this weapon.

name: Dragon Tusk
description: A dragon fossil carved into the shape of a tusk. The sound of a strong wind can be heard coming from within.

name: Beetle's Horn
description: A large horn that forks at the tip. The animal from which it was taken is unknown.

name: Icewyrm Tusk
description: This horn is far too cold to touch with bare hands. Gloves are recommended for those who wish to wield it.

name: Lazy Bone
description: A horn covered in an intricate and beautiful pattern that's known to induce sleep in those who gaze at it.
effect: Occasionally puts an enemy to sleep.

name: White Stag's Antler
description: The antler of a legendary white stag. It is said to inspire its wielder to perform feats of heroism.

name: Woodcutter's Ax
description: Though this simple ax was designed to chop firewood, it is nevertheless an effective weapon on the battlefield.

name: Iron Ax
description: A sturdy ax with a chunky iron head that allows for wild swinging.

name: Watchmaker's Ax
description: This ax's blade is fine enough to cut watch cogs, and can cleave living flesh with frightening ease.

name: Guardsman's Ax
description: The favored ax of Hamelin grunts. Made using the latest techniques, it is strong, light and affordable.

name: Clockwork Ax
description: An ax whose head consists of a spinning cog that mangles anything unfortunate enough to be caught in it.

name: Grand Ax
description: A heavy double-handed ax whose design is simple, yet effective. Though mass-produced, they are not cheap.

name: Giant's Ax
description: An ax that was once used by a legendary giant to topple an entire regiment of soldiers with one blow.

name: Demon's Ax
description: An ancient ax, believed to have claimed the lives of countless brave warriors, and widely feared.

name: War God's Ax
description: A solid gold ax, once wielded by a warlike deity. It sunders stone as if it were air.

name: Ogre King's Ax
description: A giant ax that once belonged to a fearsome ogre. Simply holding it gives the wielder a sense of its power.

name: Wooden Mallet
description: A hammer made from a piece of solid wood. It cannot compete with metal weapons when it comes to power.

name: Massive Mallet
description: A hammer built according to the simple idea that bigger is better. Its sheer size is rather reassuring.

name: Tower Toppler
description: Despite its weight, this ingeniously designed hammer requires next to no strength to wield.

name: Hammer of Justice
description: The hammer of a knight who fought only to protect others. It is said to inspire kindness in the wielder.

name: Tomte Whomper
description: A leather-covered lump of ice, attached to the end of a stick. A chill wind blows from within it as it strikes.

name: Ninnyhammer
description: A hammer that makes a funny sound upon impact, leaving enemies seeing stars and thoroughly confused.

name: Steam Hammer
description: A hammer with a steam-powered booster that ensures it swings true, making it easier to strike enemies.

name: Meteor Mallet
description: An enormous and hugely destructive hammer. It strikes with the power of a falling star.

name: Mom's Favorite Pan
description: Many a hearty breakfast has been cooked in this sturdy pan, much loved by a certain Motorville mother.
effect: Restores HP when it damages an enemy.

name: Sharpened Stick
description: A rudimentary spear, carved from a long piece of wood and sometimes used to prop up clotheslines.

name: Hoarfrost Harpoon
description: A spear with a tip made from semi-transparent ice that is destined never to melt.

name: Flint Spear
description: Though this spear's head is made from sturdy sharpened stone, the shaft is surprisingly flimsy.

name: Pig-Iron Pike
description: A long iron spear that will last a lifetime, as long as it is maintained properly and prevented from rusting.

name: Gale Spear
description: A spear whose finely sculpted head is said to have the power to summon mighty whirlwinds.

name: Dryad's Spear
description: A large spear, carved from the branch of a spirit tree and said to be imbued with its power.
effect: Restores HP when it damages an enemy.

name: Soldier's Spear
description: The basic spear of the Hamelin grunt. Its design means that anyone can wield it with ease.

name: Lightning Bolt
description: A slender spear, imbued with the power of a raging storm. Thunder clouds gather when its tip is raised.

name: Royal Spear
description: A spear whose elegance is immediately apparent. In times gone by, it was the sole preserve of royalty.

name: Bee Sting
description: A sinister spear with a tip that contains lethal poison, and a garish design that intimidates one's enemies.

name: Champion's Spear
description: This spear gives its victims no chance of evading, and may only be wielded by true warriors.

name: Deadeye Spear
description: Once used by a legendary and much-loved huntsman, no enemy is swift enough to escape from this spear.

name: Crystal Spear
description: A spear whose pure crystal tip refracts light all over the battlefield, exposing enemies' darkest secrets.

name: Rainbow Lance
description: This lance's prism-shaped head can shine a light into the deepest recesses of an enemy's soul.

name: Dragon Lance
description: A lance that possesses those who wield it, ensuring they remain fiercely focused on the enemy at all times.

name: Glorious Lance
description: This proud weapon gleams like pure gold. It is said that victory is a mere formality to whoever wields it.

name: Giant's Spear
description: A spear that once belonged to a ferocious, warlike giant. Its multiple blades are a fearsome sight to behold.

name: Longshank
description: The prized possession of a great warrior, this long spear puts the whole battlefield within the wielder's range.

name: Lullaby Lance
description: A lance that contains the countless embarrassing memories of a shameless Fairy Godmother.
effect: Occasionally puts an enemy to sleep.

name: Set of Crude Claws
description: Animal claws that have simply been stuck together. Their curved tips make them deadly at close range.

name: Set of Bullhorn Claws
description: A set of horn-shaped claws that are set far apart, allowing the wearer to skewer two enemies at once.

name: Set of Knucklebone Claws
description: Sharp imitation claws, carved from the hardest bones available. Light<->weight and highly portable weapons.

name: Set of Woodland Claws
description: A set of claws made from a plank of wood and liable to sprout leaves if not properly maintained.

name: Set of Haunted Claws
description: Some say these claws are possessed by an evil spirit, but there is no actual evidence to support this.

name: Set of Tainted Claws
description: Claws which secrete a powerful toxin that, once in the bloodstream, affects the whole body within seconds.

name: Set of Gaudy Claws
description: Dazzling golden claws that were once the property of a gambler known as the "Casino King."

name: Set of Steel Claws
description: Sharp military claws, issued to a regiment of soldiers who specialize in tackling powerful monsters.

name: Set of Giant's Fingernails
description: Heavy claws made from a set of gargantuan fingernails. Simply picking them up is beyond most people.

name: Set of Six Wind Claws
description: Claws that once belonged to a mountain spirit. Capable of unleashing a howling gale upon the enemy.

name: Set of Crucible Claws
description: Pure steel claws that fit over the hand like a glove, allowing the wearer to punch through solid stone walls.

name: Set of Snow Witch Claws
description: Claws hardened by exposure to extreme cold. The wounds they inflict freeze instantly and agonizingly.

name: Set of Ice Queen Claws
description: Claws that contain the spirit of a sorceress queen. They cut deep, chilling the victim to the very soul.

name: Set of Ice Crystal Claws
description: A mysterious glow is emitted from the tips of these claws, made from polished ice.

name: Set of Blackwyrm Claws
description: The claws of a dark dragon, said to be a harbinger of doom. Their victims suffer long and agonizing torment.

name: Set of Cat King's Claws
description: A ceremonial weapon, made from the claws of the cat kings of Ding Dong Dell.

name: Set of Griffin's Talons
description: The talons of a mighty griffin—truly the greatest of all beasts. Other creatures quiver in their presence.

name: Set of Dragon King's Claws
description: A rare weapon, made from the claws of an ancient dragon and usually wielded only by royalty.

name: Set of Star Eater's Claws
description: These claws emit a magical glow, and are said to have come from a monster that feasted on the stars themselves.

name: Set of Werewolf Claws
description: Once thought to exist only in fairy tales, these silver claws become even sharper when the moon is full.
effect: Occasionally puts an enemy to sleep.

name: Set of Flawed Claws
description: Bright red claws that are covered in countless spikes—inside as well as out, unfortunately.
effect: Damages the wielder as well as the enemy.

name: Suit of Leather Armor
description: A simple suit of armor, made from animal hide. Though fairly flimsy, it allows for great freedom of movement.

name: Suit of Rugged Armor
description: This armor is made from sturdy animal hide, and is said to become stronger with every blow it receives.

name: Iron Breastplate
description: A basic piece of armor, beaten from a sheet of iron. Cheap, and readily available at Cawtermaster's Stores.

name: Suit of Toughened Armor
description: A suit of armor made from tough leather that has been heat-treated to offer extra protection.

name: Suit of Scale Armor
description: A well-made suit of armor that offers a decent degree of protection without unduly impeding movement.

name: Suit of Grunt Armor
description: Military-issue armor, forged from discarded pig iron. Cheaply available all over Hamelin.

name: Suit of Bone Mail
description: A suit of armor made from especially tough bones. It is lighter than iron and just as robust.

name: Suit of Mirrored Armor
description: Armor that has been enchanted so as to ward off evil. It is said that no disaster will ever befall its wearer.

name: Suit of Gale Armor
description: Armor that has been blessed by a wind spirit. It offers its wearer protection from the storm.

name: Suit of Pure Steel Armor
description: Made from specially purified steel, this armor retains its gleam during even the most bloody of battles.

name: Suit of Champion's Armor
description: Armor that fills its wearer with pride. Its strength derives from memories of the countless conflicts it has survived.

name: Suit of Inferno Armor
description: Created specifically for doing battle with fiery dragons, this armor is impervious to both heat and flame.

name: Suit of Royal Armor
description: Once worn by a courageous king, this armor is said to give one the strength to overcome any fear.

name: Suit of Stout Armor
description: This thick armor is forged from heavy iron plates, sacrificing mobility for near-impregnable toughness.

name: Suit of Enchanted Armor
description: Decorated with enchanted gemstones, this armor confers magical protection on wizards and non-wizards alike.

name: Suit of Knight's Armor
description: Only selected knights may don this armor, adorned with reminders of past wearers' heroic accomplishments.
effect: Deflects damage back onto the attacker.

name: Suit of Dress Armor
description: Garishly decorated golden armor that boasts a toughness not immediately apparent to the casual observer.

name: Suit of Night Armor
description: The impenetrable gloom which surrounds this suit of armor serves to lessen the wearer's fear of the dark.

name: Suit of Enigma Armor
description: Armor that draws its power from a strange fossil. Despite its appearance, it is actually harder than steel.

name: Suit of Boarlord's Armor
description: A replica of a suit of armor once worn by an emperor of Hamelin. Imposing and impressively tough.

name: Suit of Armor of Justice
description: The armor of a knight who fought only to protect his friends. It has the power to heal the wounds of its wearer.

name: Suit of Brilliant Armor
description: A suit of armor whose sheen inspires bravery in the meek and brings light to the darkest corners of the soul.

name: Suit of Nazcaän Armor
description: Armor awarded to Nazcaän soldiers in order to bolster their sense of patriotism and loyalty.

name: Suit of Celestial Armor
description: Magical armor that has bathed in the light of the stars. It protects its wearer from all magical afflictions.

name: Suit of War God's Armor
description: Once owned by a warlike deity, this battle-scarred armor possesses power beyond human comprehension.

name: Set of Rustic Garb
description: Everyday clothing for the citizens of Ding Dong Dell. Made from natural fibers and always cheaply available.

name: Set of Merchant's Garb
description: Lightweight clothing said to improve its wearer's sales patter. Remember to put it on before going to market!

name: Hallowed Habit
description: A shimmering garment, interwoven with silver thread. Its gleam has been known to confuse certain creatures.

name: Rubber Robe
description: A waterproof garment that has a life buoy stitched into its midriff. For those who value dryness over fashion.

name: Fine Frock
description: This glamorous piece of evening wear, lavishly adorned with gleaming jewels, is said to bring its wearer good luck.

name: Soldier's Smock
description: A light garment worn by Hamelin grunts for training. Its flattering cut makes it popular with fashionistas too.

name: Misty Shroud
description: A garment woven from strands of morning mist. It allows one to descend upon an enemy unnoticed.
effect: Makes it easier to evade attacks.

name: Set of Noble Attire
description: A fine outfit, once in the possession of a noble family. Simply putting it on is said to sharpen one's senses.

name: Champion's Tunic
description: This traditional garment allows for great freedom of movement, and is imbued with a warrior's spirit.

name: Sasquash Pelt
description: The white, furry pelt of a creature that inhabits the Winter Isles. Waterproof and very resistant to cold.

name: Magic Cloak
description: An enchanted garment. Though it offers little protection from attack, it does give wizards a magical boost.

name: Set of Dead Man's Duds
description: A sinister black garment. Its wearer runs the risk of being mistaken by evil spirits for one of their own.

name: Starspun Tunic
description: This outfit exudes a pure, warm glow, and has the power to heal its wearer's body.

name: Set of Wizard's Robes
description: An outfit made using age-old techniques. It is said to confer miraculous powers upon its wearer.

name: Set of Mist Robes
description: As worn by ancient wizards. Donning these robes is said to give a boost to one's positivity and ambition.

name: Set of Flame Robes
description: Designed to be worn on journeys across the desert, these robes repel both heat and sand.

name: Set of Gale Robes
description: Lightweight robes that can deflect even the strongest wind, creating an oasis of calm around the wearer.

name: Set of Ripple Robes
description: Robes that are shrouded in a thin veil of moisture. Completely waterproof, they are the ideal outfit for a rainy day.

name: Set of Mystic's Robes
description: A robe of woven iron sand that allows the wearer to become attuned to nearby magnetic fields.

name: Robe of Restoration
description: A faint glow envelops this pale green robe, which is said to lift one's spirits when worn.

name: Set of Sorceress's Robes
description: Robes adorned with countless magical gems that are said to protect the wearer from calamity.

name: Goddess's Gown
description: A garment woven by a supernatural being. It offers its wearer protection from magical attacks.

name: Wooden Shield
description: A basic wooden shield. It is of little real use on the battlefield, and is more commonly used as a children's toy.

name: Leather Shield
description: A light shield, made by covering a wooden frame with a piece of animal hide—the tougher the better.

name: Shinbone Shield
description: A crude shield, made from animal bones. The string that binds them together is the design's weak point.

name: Iron Shield
description: A shield made from several layers of iron. While undeniably strong, it is too heavy for most to wield.

name: Scale Shield
description: Made from hard scales laid on top of each other, this waterproof shield deflects most enemy blows with ease.

name: Grunt Shield
description: The basic shield of the Hamelin grunt. With the right posture, it can cover the bearer's whole body.

name: Shadowglass Shield
description: A sturdy black shield that was very popular amongst those who fought in the Wizard Wars.

name: Champion's Shield
description: The shield of a celebrated soldier. Carrying it into battle helps keep one focused on the task at hand.

name: Avenger's Shield
description: A curiously shaped shield with an unusually glossy surface that deflects enemy attacks.

name: Holy Shield
description: A shield made from a gleaming white metal. Its unblemished surface prevents the wielder from being nixed.

name: Tundra Shield
description: A shield that lay for centuries under a thick sheet of ice. It shrugs aside the wrath of blizzards.

name: Mystical Shield
description: This shield offers protection from foes who would nix one, making it popular with the wizarding community.

name: Shield of the Pure
description: A shield that has been cleansed of all evil. It cannot be held by those with impure intentions.

name: Goddess's Shield
description: A shield created by a divine being. Its dainty appearance belies its incredible resilience.

name: War God's Shield
description: A shield once used by a warlike deity to swat a falling meteorite back into the night sky.
effect: Deflects damage back onto the attacker.

name: Shiny Shield
description: Made from a lustrous metal, this mirrored shield disarms enemies by showing them their own reflection.

name: Pretty Parasol
description: Though this dainty parasol looks nothing like a shield, it is remarkably effective at deflecting enemy blows.

name: Wooden Helmet
description: Basic headgear, carved from an old tree trunk. Though rather heavy, it keeps one's head well-protected.

name: Pointy Hat
description: This aptly named hat is the first thing that comes to mind when one thinks of wizarding headwear.

name: Soldier's Helmet
description: A standard piece of iron headgear. Many soldiers are loath to take them off—even in bed.

name: Champion's Helm
description: A helmet made from specially purified steel. It gives the wearer a sense of strength and purpose.

name: Blessed Helm
description: A helmet that confers a blessing upon its wearer, granting safety and fortune on the battlefield.

name: Helm of Hamelin
description: A helmet worn by officers in the Hamelin army to distinguish them from ordinary grunts.

name: Nazcaän Helm
description: A helmet given only to chosen Nazcaän soldiers. It is said to prevent one's judgment from being clouded.

name: War God's Helm
description: Once worn by a legendary warlike deity, this helm was carved from the skull of a mighty magical beast.
effect: Deflects damage back onto the attacker.

name: Leafy Mantle
description: A cloak made from soft green leaves. It provides protection from the elements along with a soothing aroma.

name: Snakeskin Cloak
description: This diamond-patterned snakeskin cloak is a delight to the touch, but a nightmare to keep clean.

name: Cloud Cover
description: A weightless cloak, woven from fine strands of mist. Wearing it allows one to become almost invisible.

name: Sea Breeze Cloak
description: Having once fluttered in a sea breeze, this sailor's cloak retains some of the ocean's power.

name: Stripy Cloak
description: Though made from an eye-catching pelt, this cloak actually makes the wearer harder to spot.

name: Breezy Cloak
description: A cloak that creates a gently caressing breeze around its wearer, warding off stronger winds.

name: Caghoul
description: Strangers tend to stay away from those who wear this unsettling ghost hair cloak.

name: Eagle Eye Cloak
description: A light blue cloak that puts one in mind of clear skies. Gazing at it for too long may make you feel dizzy...

name: Cyclone Cloak
description: A strong gale is trapped amongst the fibers of this fine cloak, allowing its wearer to run like the wind itself.

name: Green Man's Cloak
description: This cloak's bright color and fresh fragrance put a spring in one's step. Better still, they're wholly natural!

name: Champion's Cloak
description: The cloak of a great warrior. Draping it over one's shoulders fills one with courage and determination.

name: Aurora Cloak
description: A cloak that shimmers beautifully as it ripples. Seeing it flutter in the wind puts one in mind of the aurora itself.

name: Dusk Mantle
description: Dyed the burned orange color of the setting sun, this soft cloak has a wonderfully calming effect.
effect: Makes it easier to evade attacks.

name: Phantom Mantle
description: This cloak uses magic to refract light, rendering the wearer invisible, and confusing enemies.

name: Beast-Hide Cloak
description: This supple cloak does not rustle when it moves, allowing its wearer to launch surprise attacks.

name: Necromancer's Mantle
description: This jet-black cloak has been known to convert those who wear it to the cause of darkness...

name: Heavenly Mantle
description: This divine cloak ensures that travelers always enjoy the fairest of winds.
effect: Makes it easier to evade attacks.

name: Diva's Mantle
description: A gaudy cloak that gives wearers the wholly unfounded impression that they're better than everyone else.

name: Giant's Tooth
description: A tooth taken from a giant. Its fearsome appearance prompts panic in enemies.

name: Set of Beast Fangs
description: The knife-like fangs of a ferocious wolf. They are very sharp, and excel at finding enemy weak points.

name: Poisoned Fang
description: A venomous fang that continues to drip with poison even after its surface is wiped clean. Handle with care.

name: Soretooth Ring
description: Historically worn by assault troops, this type of ring robs its wearer's enemy of vitality.

name: Set of Piercing Fangs
description: A set of fangs that can penetrate any material as if it were as insubstantial as the clouds above.

name: Devil's Fang
description: A ring made from the fang of a terrifying demon, capable of turning sturdy armor into a pile of rust.

name: Skullfang Ring
description: A ring made from a fang that has pierced the flesh of countless hapless enemies.

name: Dragonstooth Ring
description: This ornate ring, made from a dragon fang, guides its wearer's attacks toward enemy weak points.

name: Soulfang Necklace
description: A necklace that absorbs energy from enemy souls, using it to strengthen the wearer's bond with familiars.

name: Set of Wolf Fangs
description: Pure white fangs that cause enemies to freeze in terror. Witnessing their power chills one's very bones.

name: Crimson Fang
description: Though stained red by the blood of countless victims, this fang still seems thirsty for more.
effect: Deflects damage back onto the attacker.

name: Fiend's Fang
description: A fang that is rightly feared for the catastrophic effect it has on anything it touches—its owner included.

name: Set of Griffin's Teeth
description: A necklace bearing the highly prized teeth of a griffin, the beast before whom all others bow down.

name: Harrowfang
description: The fang of a swamp-dwelling beast. Its venom can be lethal if it makes contact with the skin.

name: Star Eater's Fang
description: The darkly glowing fang of a legendary beast that was said to have feasted upon the stars.

name: Set of Nix Gnashers
description: A set of man-made teeth that are capable of draining a victim's spirit.

name: Wyrmfang Ring
description: Carved from the bones of a mighty dragon, whose ancient corpse is now a well-known mountain range.

name: White Stag's Tooth
description: A ring adorned with a tooth taken from a legendary white stag. Beautiful to look at and effective during battle.

name: Sturdy Scale
description: A waterproof scale that's admired for its toughness, being very difficult to break or bend.

name: Stalwart Scale
description: Though chosen for its toughness, this scale also has the effect of deepening a wizard's bond with their familiars.

name: Set of Steel Scales
description: Hard scales, forged from steel. They are strong and fire-resistant, yet also admirably light.

name: Shadowglass Scale
description: This darkly gleaming scale is said to make its wearer more attuned to the forces of darkness.

name: Set of Storm Serpent Scales
description: Bulky scales that once belonged to a fearsome sea serpent. Often worn as charms by superstitious sailors.

name: Salamander Scale
description: A scale shaped like a dancing flame. It is said to give its wearer the power to command raging blazes.

name: Deep Blue Scale
description: An elegant azure scale that brings bodies of water under its wearer's command.

name: Set of Shining Scales
description: Bright, amber-colored scales that give their wearer more control over the forces of light.

name: Wyrm King's Scale
description: A dragon scale that takes a century to grow and shed. It gives the wearer a boost in every department.

name: Medal of Strength
description: A heavy medal, carved from stone. It has the power to summon its wearer's very last reserves of energy.
effect: Increases attack when HP are full.

name: Medal of Dexterity
description: A medal created in honor of a great warrior. Its elegant design recalls his famously dexterous swordplay.

name: Medal of Fortitude
description: This lovingly crafted medal sports a whirlpool design which somehow serves to absorb enemy blows.

name: Medal of Agility
description: A blessed medal that is sure to lift its wearer's spirits during drawn-out battles.

name: Medal of Valor
description: A medal that shines brightly when worn by the courageous. It serves as a reminder of the importance of bravery.

name: Medal of Steadfastness
description: A medal with a wholly unblemished surface. It is said to help protect the most vulnerable parts of one's body.

name: Medal of Impunity
description: A medal whose constant, dazzling gleam does tend to draw attention to the wearer.

name: Bravado Badge
description: A badge that provides a swell of the self-confidence so necessary for successful spell casting.

name: Braggart's Badge
description: A badge that compels wearers to always give of their best, raising their spirits and strengthening their muscles.

name: Battler's Badge
description: Made from very sturdy materials, this badge helps protect its wearer from enemy blows.

name: Adamant Badge
description: This badge's crest grants its wearer the determination never to give up in the face of adversity.
effect: Prevents knockouts when HP are high.

name: Fire Seal
description: A badge adorned with a roaring blaze. It protects its wearer from fiery attacks.

name: Avenger's Badge
description: A powerful badge that allows the wearer to draw strength from suffering endured.
effect: Deflects damage back onto the attacker.

name: Bracer Badge
description: A badge said to contain a warrior's soul, bearing the image of a shield. It strengthens its wearer's defense.

name: Water Seal
description: A badge adorned with a raindrop. It protects its wearer from water-based attacks.

name: Storm Seal
description: A badge adorned with tempestuous winds. It protects its wearer from storm-based attacks.

name: Ironclad Badge
description: A badge given to warriors who have defensive roles, enabling them to guard more effectively.

name: Hot-Blooded Badge
description: Once worn by a passionate warrior, this badge gives its wearer a burning desire to fight for justice.

name: Brinkman's Badge
description: A badge that grants its wearer power at times of crisis, turning potential disaster into opportunity.
effect: Increases attack when HP are low.

name: Bastion Badge
description: A badge that reminds its wearer that victory is always possible, even when staring defeat in the face.
effect: Increases defense when HP are low.

name: Hardheaded Badge
description: A badge said to contain a warrior's soul, bearing the image of a helmet. It strengthens its wearer's defense.

name: Barrier Badge
description: A unique-looking badge that erects a transparent defensive barrier in front of its wearer.

name: Berserker's Badge
description: A badge that contains the soul of a warrior who was prepared to make sacrifices in order to achieve his ends.

name: Omniseal
description: A badge adorned with the all-seeing eye. It protects its wearer from all kinds of attack.
effect: Increases resistance to all attack types.
